Package demoworld.controller

Class GameController

Object
GameController
Direct Known Subclasses:
Controller, DiceController, FeatureSearchController, MenuBarController, SheetController, SpecialtySearchController
public class GameController extends Object
Parent class for any controllers that require access to the full game state. i.e. the RuleBook and the Character as well as the main view.
